  • Classes in com.asoroka.sidora.csvmetadata.heuristics used by com.asoroka.sidora.csvmetadata 
    Class and Description
    DataTypeHeuristic
    Determines into which DataType a series of values most likely falls.
    HeaderHeuristic
    Test a row of fields to see if they represent a header.
  • Classes in com.asoroka.sidora.csvmetadata.heuristics used by com.asoroka.sidora.csvmetadata.heuristics 
    Class and Description
    CountAggregatingHeuristic
    A DataTypeHeuristic that aggregates count information for its field.
    DataTypeHeuristic
    Determines into which DataType a series of values most likely falls.
    FractionHeuristic
    A heuristic that permits a certain specified fraction of values to fail at parsing.
    HeaderHeuristic
    Test a row of fields to see if they represent a header.
    RunningMinMaxHeuristic 
    StrictHeuristic
    A very strict heuristic for determining types for CSV fields.

    Class and Description

    A DataTypeHeuristic that aggregates count information for its field.
    DataTypeHeuristic
    Determines into which DataType a series of values most likely falls.
    HeaderHeuristic
    Test a row of fields to see if they represent a header.
    HeaderHeuristic.Default
    This is a very simple test of whether a line is a header line.
